job_lists.title: Data Engineer
job_lists.company: 台灣美光晶圓科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: Job Description:As a Data Engineer at Micron Technology Inc., you are a key member of a cross-functional team responsible for developing and growing Micron’s methods and systems for extracting new insight for our expanding data streams. You will collaborate with various roles and teams across the enterprise to design and implement systems to extract data from Micron’s manufacturing, R&D and engineering systems, transforming it into an actionable format, and as needed, creating dynamic presentation layers for use by high-level engineers and managers throughout the company.
job_lists.other_condition: Qualifications:3+ years of experience in ANY TWO of the following: • Proficient with one or more Data Extraction Tools (SSIS, Informatica, SAP BODS, etc.).• Proficient with one or more high-level client, object-oriented language (e.g., C#, C++, JAVA, Python, Perl, etc.). • Proficient with one or more web programming language (PHP, MySQL, Python, Perl, JavaScript, ASP, etc.).• Solid Software development experiences• Data management systems, including Oracle, MS SQL, Teradata, and NoSQL • BI tool experience (MDX, Integration Services, Analysis Services, Reporting Services, SharePoint, Business Objects, or Tableau) • Software architecture (data structures, data schemas, etc.)• Developing, automating, and managing an ecosystem of ETL processes• Multiple operating systems (e.g., MS Office, Unix, Linux, etc.) • Experience with Agile practices is a plus• Familiarity with SAP/ABAP is a plus • Good communication skills in EnglishEducation:• Bachelor’s degree and above in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Applied Mathematics or related field.

我們的工作在創造研發產品，協助企業提升工作效率，我們需要你一起來讓產品更美好：
1. 大型企業管理系統開發設計 
2. 企業流程系統開發設計 

[ 徵求條件 ]
1. 對程式開發及軟體工程具有熱情，願意嘗試新技術及架構
2. 可獨立或與團隊成員合作
job_lists.skills: 系統維護操作、軟體工程系統開發、軟體程式設計、資料庫程式設計、系統架構規劃與維護、網路系統配置、網路架設佈線、網路應用軟體操作
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

job_lists.title: 專案經理（上海/蘇州）
job_lists.company: 新人類資訊科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: 1. 提案簡報2. 專案管理（前置規劃、流程分析、解決方案評估、系統分析、系統設計、系統開發、資料驗證、系統測試、使用者測試）。3. 系統訪談。4. 系統分析。5. 專案風險之管理與排除。

job_lists.title: 客服系統分析員
job_lists.company: 安心國際專業徵信有限公司
job_lists.content:
1.資料搜集，之後的是分析，最重要的是策略運用。(資料分析 資料科學 資料架構 策略規劃)
2.設計資料之結構，規劃各種通訊資料之整合，以利資料庫正常運作
3.研訂資料及人員之保密區分、資訊安全管理
4.支援應用程式設計工作
5.維持資料庫的正常運作，加強資料庫的安全管理，以防止駭客或有心人士入資料庫
6.具備解決問題的能力
7.有一定的知識理論基礎、清晰的邏輯、實驗精神、與人溝通合作的能力
8.而且比起解決問題，還必須要會發現問題地能力
9.評估並分析現行運作系統，確定其功能需求、所需資源及績效需求，據此發展系統架構以改良使用環境及產作業效率，據以訂定系統所需之功能及範圍
10.蒐集及分析客戶業務資料，分析客戶狀況與企業經營實況，發展系統運作策略，制定優先順序，訂定資訊化與客觀化之營運目標
11.妥善規劃作業系統，根據使用效度擬定系統輸入與輸出流程、介面操作機制及作業處理方案

發展遠景：應徵前請先瞭解本公司。
www.relieved.com.tw

本公司致力於突破目前民眾對於徵信社的負面觀感，

目前本公司股東成員已經有兩位律師、一位上市公司CFO、一位準諮商心理師(碩士攻讀中)

還有各界對匡正徵信調查風氣有興趣且再本公司看到成果的投資人~

並且有全省共30家律師事務所及北中南各科學園區公司人資部及法務部

皆指名調查案件委任本公司，舉凡案件訴訟證據收集、員工股東競業禁止條款蒐證、

公司合作前風險評估DD調查，都是本公司強項，外遇抓姦更不在話下了。

來這裡上班一定可以學到東西，起碼不會變成壞小孩...

這邊可以學到什麼一技之長：

1、解決問題的方法。(而且是你從來沒想過的方向)

2、高度的耐心。(跟監等待需要耐心、跟另外一半有外遇的客戶溝通更需要無比的耐心)

3、法律方面和心理學方面的知識。(公司有律師和準諮詢心理師)

4、開車技術一定會變好，把汽車當機車在鑽是基本。

5、一心多用，活化你的大腦...達成舉一反八的人生成就。
成就樂趣：安心專業徵信社 (Relieved.com.tw) 雖不比其他家徵信業者的〝大〝型規模。
但卻是國內唯一具有許多正面新聞且從未與客戶有任何消費糾紛的正派合法徵信社！

我們期望擁有專業知識卻不想埋沒的您的加入。
安心專業徵信社 (Relieved.com.tw) 擁有最強的徵信團隊，我們的同仁皆受過專業的教育訓練，且我們願意將獲利回饋給與我們共同奮戰的夥伴們，每年平均總體調薪幅度都超過8％以上！《徵信社工作》是同業之冠！

我們希望走出國內徵信社，並朝亞洲區徵信社龍頭為目標，公司內部不乏英、日、法各國留學回來之企圖性高之同仁。

不僅如此，我們擁有最強大的公司體制，
公司內部充滿人情味；交通方便且充滿設計感的辦公環境；不斷培訓同仁專業技能的培訓；
PS:每半年員工旅遊一次(國內)，一年一次員工旅遊(國外)，公司聚餐跟看電影社交都是常有的事不多說。

我們喜歡有衝勁、善良、負責任之同仁。
如果您看到這裡，對我們的公司很感興趣，請投下您的履歷吧!

job_lists.title: 系統整合師
job_lists.company: 安心國際專業徵信有限公司
job_lists.content:
1.資料搜集，之後的是分析，最重要的是策略運用。(資料分析 資料科學 資料架構 策略規劃)
2.設計資料之結構，規劃各種通訊資料之整合，以利資料庫正常運作
3.研訂資料及人員之保密區分、資訊安全管理
4.支援應用程式設計工作
5.維持資料庫的正常運作，加強資料庫的安全管理，以防止駭客或有心人士入資料庫
6.具備解決問題的能力
7.有一定的知識理論基礎、清晰的邏輯、實驗精神、與人溝通合作的能力
8.而且比起解決問題，還必須要會發現問題地能力
9.評估並分析現行運作系統，確定其功能需求、所需資源及績效需求，據此發展系統架構以改良使用環境及產作業效率，據以訂定系統所需之功能及範圍
10.蒐集及分析客戶業務資料，分析客戶狀況與企業經營實況，發展系統運作策略，制定優先順序，訂定資訊化與客觀化之營運目標
11.妥善規劃作業系統，根據使用效度擬定系統輸入與輸出流程、介面操作機制及作業處理方案

發展遠景：應徵前請先瞭解本公司。
www.relieved.com.tw

本公司致力於突破目前民眾對於徵信社的負面觀感，

目前本公司股東成員已經有兩位律師、一位上市公司CFO、一位準諮商心理師(碩士攻讀中)

還有各界對匡正徵信調查風氣有興趣且再本公司看到成果的投資人~

並且有全省共30家律師事務所及北中南各科學園區公司人資部及法務部

皆指名調查案件委任本公司，舉凡案件訴訟證據收集、員工股東競業禁止條款蒐證、

公司合作前風險評估DD調查，都是本公司強項，外遇抓姦更不在話下了。

來這裡上班一定可以學到東西，起碼不會變成壞小孩...

這邊可以學到什麼一技之長：

1、解決問題的方法。(而且是你從來沒想過的方向)

2、高度的耐心。(跟監等待需要耐心、跟另外一半有外遇的客戶溝通更需要無比的耐心)

3、法律方面和心理學方面的知識。(公司有律師和準諮詢心理師)

4、開車技術一定會變好，把汽車當機車在鑽是基本。

5、一心多用，活化你的大腦...達成舉一反八的人生成就。
成就樂趣：安心專業徵信社 (Relieved.com.tw) 雖不比其他家徵信業者的〝大〝型規模。
但卻是國內唯一具有許多正面新聞且從未與客戶有任何消費糾紛的正派合法徵信社！

我們期望擁有專業知識卻不想埋沒的您的加入。
安心專業徵信社 (Relieved.com.tw) 擁有最強的徵信團隊，我們的同仁皆受過專業的教育訓練，且我們願意將獲利回饋給與我們共同奮戰的夥伴們，每年平均總體調薪幅度都超過8％以上！《徵信社工作》是同業之冠！

我們希望走出國內徵信社，並朝亞洲區徵信社龍頭為目標，公司內部不乏英、日、法各國留學回來之企圖性高之同仁。

不僅如此，我們擁有最強大的公司體制，
公司內部充滿人情味；交通方便且充滿設計感的辦公環境；不斷培訓同仁專業技能的培訓；
PS:每半年員工旅遊一次(國內)，一年一次員工旅遊(國外)，公司聚餐跟看電影社交都是常有的事不多說。

我們喜歡有衝勁、善良、負責任之同仁。
如果您看到這裡，對我們的公司很感興趣，請投下您的履歷吧!

job_lists.title: System Engineer
job_lists.company: 台灣美光晶圓科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: As a Linux administrator who will be responsible for designing, implementing, and monitoring the infrastructure; also, to collaborate with other team members to develop automation strategies and deployment processes. You will become an integral part of the team, making every problem of the platform a problem of your own, and solving them accordingly.Responsibilities - Define, design, and implement core system hardware and operating system solutions - Maintain systems - Support day-to-day operations and provide customer support - Ensure the operational health (Security, Availability, Performance, Interoperability and Reliability) of company's core computing resources. - Continually work to improve operations - Provide system security and access - Evolve the computing environment to meet future demands
job_lists.other_condition: Qualifications or skills: Successful candidates for this position will have: - Experience with Linux servers in virtualized environments - Familiarity with the fundamentals of Linux scripting languages - Experience installing, configuring, and maintaining services - Strong grasp on configuration management tools, such as Puppet - Familiarity with load balancing, firewalls, etc. - Proficient with network tools such as iptables, Linux IPVS, HAProxy, etc. - Experience with virtualization technologies, such as VMware - Ability to build and monitor services on production servers - Knowledge of servers and switches - English speaking skills (TOEIC > 500 recommended) - The ability to work independently and in a mutli-national cross functional team - The ability to handle multiple tasks while meeting project deadlinesEducation: Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering or a related discipline. (minimum requirement)

job_lists.title: 資訊處-程式設計師(Java)
job_lists.company: 陽信商業銀行股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
1.負責銀行資訊服務系統(網路銀行、行動銀行、WebATM、外匯、台外幣…等系統)之系統設計、程式開發及單元測試。
2.問題追蹤、異常排除及效能調校。
job_lists.other_condition:
1.邏輯清晰、溝通能力強。

job_lists.title: “System Analyst – Oracle ERP” (高通新竹辦公室駐點約聘人員)
job_lists.company: 敦陽科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: The primary responsibility for this position is to support Oracle-based ERP Application to support business Needs.  The work domain includes manufacturing, procurement, B2B and master data.  This individual will need to work with business closely to understand demand, analyze problem, convey technical requirement to global development.  System Analyst will also join supplier onboarding project to interact with onboarding project team closely.    Candidates must have a strong background in Oracle Distribution or Manufacturing Applications R12, Oracle Technology and development tools. The candidate should also have proven communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills to help support the development process, and to ensure that project deliverables are met according to specifications. This person must be able to work with other team members around the globe (US and India), to provide operational support.
job_lists.other_condition: 3+ years of experience in Implementing Oracle E-Business suite. Should have implemented and/or participated in one of Oracle Manufacturing / or Distribution implementation (INV, WIP, OSFM, PO, OM, WMS).    Strong technical knowledge of the underlying Oracle tables, integration points and technology processes are critical to success in this role. Experience with query tools (Toad, SQLPlus) and a working knowledge of SQL queries is a must. Experience in engaging Oracle Support to research and resolve issues. Ability to work independently with limited general supervision. Experiences in Semiconductor manufacturing or similar industries are highly desired. The preferred candidate should have experience working in a large multi-national corporation, must have multi-lingual capability (minimum English and Chinese) in order to help bridge the communication requirements between the US teams and the Asia teams.A Master or BA degree in Business Administration, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Commerce, or similar fields.

job_lists.title: 資訊安全管理師 Information Security Administrator
job_lists.company: 好市多股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
To support the overarching values and business goals of Costco Wholesale as they relate to meeting legal, ethical and regulatory obligations; protecting member privacy; and maintaining a security technology environment for our operations. The Information Security Administrator provides consultative services, works with vendors for product consideration and recommendation, performs monitoring and auditing of information system activities, creates and maintains documentation related to policies, standards and procedures; and, mentors team members with lesser subject matter expertise.

Be responsible to determine and establish the approach by which IS GRC(Governance, Risk & Compliance) will manage and govern risk and compliance. This includes agreeing to a framework with internal stakeholders for reporting on progress versus objectives on a regular basis, which includes the design, collation, review, analysis, distribution and communication of the framework.
job_lists.other_condition:
-Ability to work effectively, independent of assistance
-Innovative, creative, and extremely responsive, with a strong sense of urgency
-Willing to share knowledge and assist others in understanding technical and business topics
-Willingness to work outside of regular business hours as required which can include evenings, weekends and holidays
-Experience with firewalls, routers, load balancers and DMZ silos, and packet capture technologies helpful
-Working knowledge of information systems security standards and practices (e.g., access control and system hardening, system audit and log file monitoring, security policies, and incident handling)
-Working knowledge of protocols and technologies such as TCP, UDP, SSL/TLS.
-At least one technical certification related to a major Costco platform (Microsoft, Linux or Cisco)
-Ability to interpret information security data and processes to identify potential compliance issues (SOX, HIPAA, PCI)
-Ability to quickly understand security systems in order to identify and validate security requirements using logical, risk based prioritization methods
-Willing to relocate to China for long term

job_lists.title: 資安服務工程師--台北
job_lists.company: 逸盈科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
本公司為專業資安顧問服務的提供廠商，提供給客戶專業的資安技術諮詢與處理的服務。
主要需求能力項目如下(具備其中任一項即可)：
1. 入侵偵測、上網安全(proxy)以及網站安全防護(WAF)相關設備之安裝與維護
2. 滲透測試，透過專業技術人力提供深度檢測弱點的服務，如果客戶有修補上的問題，並能夠提供修補建議。
3. 資安事件處理，能夠從被駭的主機中，找出潛伏的惡意程式。還有透過Log分析，找出攻擊者的入侵方式，最終提出全面的網路環境補強建議。如果熟悉惡意程式逆向分析者，大大加分！
4. 結合本公司其他專業的資安解決方案，提供全面性的資安問題諮詢與處理的服務。

以上項目為目前我們主要需求的工作內容，如果對於資安技術有興趣追求的人，非常歡迎與本公司面談，希望會讓您對資安防護的工作需求，有完全不同的認知，並且在專業服務的經驗上有明顯的提升!

job_lists.title: Sales and Client Service Technology Application Developer (約聘)
job_lists.company: 摩根證券投資信託股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Description
This position is accountable for delivering retail business related projects. The application developer will participate on application system enrichments as well as supporting projects for requirement scoping, analysis, design, test as well as joint application development with regional/global team when required. The application developer will also analyze business requirements based on existing systems as well as be able to lead business users to summarize and rationalize requirements. 
Justification/Comments: 
The application developer supports Taiwan local vendor systems and is also the resource to be allocated into strategic projects for regional/global application systems alignment. It is important to have the resource to backfill BAU loading and collaborate with other technology and business teams to deliver projects.   
 
Key responsibilities include:
• Gather business requirements and functions from users for drafting requirement and functional specifications
• Write epics and user stories, create screen mockups, create work flow diagrams and do data analysis
• Participate in system functional testing and user testing
• Develop and write technical user guides for users
• Communicate and partnership with different types of users to finalize the business requirements 
• Perform user training and test support
• Managing local vendors where required
• Application development for related in-house built functions where required
job_lists.other_condition:
• University graduate with degree in Computer Science or a related discipline
• At least 7 years of experience on Java based technology projects. Experienced on system analysis/business requirements analysis and well versed with full development life cycle.

job_lists.title: Sr. Database Administrator
job_lists.company: 數位森林科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
• Provide software support for internally developed products that interact with all database systems.
• To implement, design and improve processes relating to the administration of databases to ensure that they function correctly, perform optimally, preserve data and maintain a high level of availability.
• This role operates in the IT environment and has a strong client focus. Changes in the role occur with changes in client, organizational and legislative requirements. 

Duties & Requirements

Database System Performance and Optimization
• Sets and maintains operational database standards on an ongoing basis.
• Enforces and improves database integrity and performance through the use of sound design principles and set down database design standards.
• Designs and enforces data security policies to eliminate unauthorized access to data on managed data systems in accordance with IT Services technical specifications and business requirements.
• Ensures that effective data redundancy; archiving, backup and recovery mechanisms are in place to prevent the loss of data.
• Sets up configurable pre-established jobs to automatically run on a daily basis, to monitor and maintain the operational databases.

Projects & Scheduled Work
• Completes all project work and allocated tasks on time as per agreed schedule and communicates progress with all parties concerned.
• Takes on additional, unplanned projects as required by the business and works after hours where necessary.
• Completes technical documentation as required.
job_lists.other_condition:
Desired Qualifications
• Relevant Degree or Tertiary qualification.
• Certification covering Microsoft SQL 2008 / 2012 / 2014.
• 5 or more years IT experience.
• 3 or more years of Database experience.

Desired Skills
• Solid IT knowledge.
• Automation scripting (Powershell v2 or higher skills an advantage).
• Understanding of programming principles.
• Sound Relational Database Theory understanding.
• Basic report design and writing.
• Microsoft T-SQL scripting.
• Microsoft SQL Server Service Broker.
• Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS).
• Microsoft SQL Replication, Mirroring & Log Shipping.
• Microsoft SQL Dynamic Management Views, Functions & Triggers.

• Document technical articles and problem resolution steps in company knowledge base system.

• Work diligently and responsibly on all live environments.
• Provide excellent services to both internal and external parties in a timely manner.

 Any modules or certification covering Microsoft SQL 2008 / 2012 / 2014.
 Experience with mobile app / API / IIS / MS SQL.
 ITIL V3 certification would be a beneficial.

job_lists.title: IT Business Analyst (AML / Actimize)
job_lists.company: 英屬維京群島商文思海輝技術有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Role: Business Analyst (Techno Functional)

Main Responsibilities: 
• Perform business analysis to support the deployment of financial products to meet clients business requirements 
• Communicate with clients to assess solution fit and identify product gaps 
• Ensure requirements are accurately specified, communicated and understood by the technical implementation team 
• Provide ongoing support to the client and to the technical implementation team to ensure the quality of the implemented system in meeting business requirements 
• Provide tuning, training and consultancy services to clients 
• Lead/perform data and quality analysis including data mapping reviews, data validation and remediation, alert validation and issue impact analysis 
• Respond to Business and Functional requirement requests 
• Comply with internal quality, reporting and administration processes 
Requirements:
• Must be very proficient in MS-Excel, MS-PowerPoint, MS-Word & Outlook. 
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills required. 
• Excellent presentation skills (Might be required to run a presentation during interview process.) 
• Candidate must have proven and significant experience as a Business Analyst 
• Candidate should have practical experience of the Financial Services industry (banking, brokerage or insurance) 
• Preference will be given to candidates with experience in Anti-Money Laundering 
• Candidates must have customer facing experience, preferably in a Consulting or Professional Services capacity 
• Strong written and verbal communication skills are essential 
• Experience of writing detailed specifications 
• Team oriented and yet able to work independently and creatively 
• Able to thrive in a fast-paced environment and learn quickly 
• Ability to travel approximately 20% of the time 
• Hands on experience in SQL would be an advantage

job_lists.title: Android Malware Analyst (Android病毒分析師)
job_lists.company: AVAST Software (Asia) Limited_香港商愛維士有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
The number of malware attacks on mobile platforms is significant and continually rises. Not every user realizes that it is our phone what can give away any information about us. Be it current location, shopping habits or access to bank account. Do you want to be the one who delves into the world of mobile malware, analyzes and produces the only thing that can save everyone – antidotes?

Then you belong to Avast!

You will:
- Analyze mobile software
- Do reverse engineering
- Select and categorize samples of malware
- Produce detection definitions
- Look for new sources of Android malware in China region
- Help us produce the protection against new malware that are escalating in China
- Cooperate with OEMs resolving cases

What we offer:
- 15 days of paid holiday
- 3 weeks long initial training in Avast HQ in Prague, Czech Republic
- The chance to join a major global tech company
- Many opportunities for professional growth (language courses, trainings, etc)
- Amazing and truly international work environment 

Sounds like the right challenge for you? We look forward to hearing from you!

job_lists.title: Business Analyst (BA)-Finance
job_lists.company: Tata Consultancy Services Limited Taiwan Branch_印度商塔塔顧問服務有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
This role’s primary responsibility is to understand and interpret the business vision and then to translate that vision from inception to implementation and post-implementation phases. By working with business stakeholders, BA need to understand their objectives, the processes they follow to perform their tasks and build requirements to service/improve/transform those processes in order to help the company achieve its goals. This may be the creation of completely new activities within the business, or transforming existing practices so they become more efficient, more productive or add more value than they presently do. 

The involvement will be through the entire System Development Life Cycle, liaising with stakeholders in building requirements documents to feed our technical coding teams, managing and updating on their progress through technical build phases and also handling the testing/rollout/delivery that during the implementation and post-implementation phases. 

Suitable candidates will be able to demonstrate the following skills/experiences: 

Experience related to Finance related function for the insurance company 
1. Identify, engage and manage stakeholders who are involved and impacted in the delivery of business goals and ensure that their requirements and accurately represented when project teams are created. 
2. Work with stakeholders, both technical and non-technical, to ensure that all teams are fully engaged and motivated to contribute to the requirements gathering process so that solutions align with the overall business vision and business goals. 
3. Be innovative in the process of gathering requirements, utilizing methods such as workshops, user interviews and other mechanisms to gather comprehensive requirements of users. Tailor these to staff working at all levels within the business. 
4. Be an integral part in the mapping out the proposed architecture of new solutions or pre-existing architecture of legacy systems and be able to justify or challenge the arrangements in order to optimize results for the business. 
5. Utilize strong analytical skills to model the performance (in theory or in practice) of systems and identify weaknesses or pressure points where they can be improved. Demonstrate findings to technical and non-technical teams with a view to gaining support and approval on benefits of changes/reviews. 
6. Be pro-active and creative in identifying opportunities for improvement without waiting for discussions or issues to be raised formally by teams within the business. 
7. Prioritize and organize workload to give greatest priority to those work streams which are most critical to the business. Communicate both up and down the management chain of the business to help stakeholders understand such prioritization. 

We are seeking business analysts familiar with 3 years digital project implementation experience (customer / partner servicing platforms by instance) or/and with 5 years experience related to New Business, POS, Marketing and finance function for the insurance company.
job_lists.other_condition:
1. A relevant degree where analytical skills have been gained. 
2. Minimum of 3-5 years IT business analysis experience and have real experience for digital related project
3. Very strong analytical skills, these will be rigorously tested during assessment/interview. 
4. Intermediate to advanced MS Excel skills, along with working knowledge of MS Visio. 
5. Experience of working in Agile methodology, formal Agile qualifications a significant advantage.
6. Professional level of communication both for writing and orally.

job_lists.title: 專案管理師 / 專案經理 ( APP PM )
job_lists.company: 威許移動股份有限公司
job_lists.content: ✔ 專案管理師 / 專案經理 ( APP PM )基本條件：(1) 重視團隊合作並尊重不同型態的夥伴。(2) 樂於與他人溝通、凝聚共識以完成任務目標者。(3) 符合 (3.1) (3.2) (3.3) 任何一項者。 (3.1) 擁有軟體開發經驗 1 年以上者。(3.2) 擁有軟體測試經驗 1 年以上者。(3.3) 擁有軟體專案管理經驗 1 年以上者。(4) 有自信可獨當一面解決問題者。加分條件 ( 非必要條件 )：(1) 熟悉 API 規格制定者更佳。(2) 熟悉 SA / SD 者更佳。(3) 擁有 EC 電子商務經驗者更佳。(4) 熟悉專案管理工具者更佳 ( 例如：Jira / Confluence / Slack ... )。(5) 曾經領導專案開發 / 產品開發者更佳。年均不到 30 的新創公司，卻發展出數百萬人使用的 APP 服務，我們要的就是有熱情、有夢想的你，加入我們的行列！(一) 威許移動主要產品與服務：✔ Qsire ─ 客製化商品設計與交易平台 ( 獲選 App Store 最佳新 App )。✔ WishMall ─ 百貨商場與零售業 O2O 解決方案。✔ WishView ─ 百貨商場與零售業 Mobile ERP 解決方案。✔ WishOrder ─ 行動化餐飲訂購服務。(二) 產品與服務描述：---------------------► Qsire---------------------我們相信，每個人都是獨特的個體，而你生活中的一切，也該獨一無二！在 Qsire 你可以親自參與商品的設計過程，讓每個環節加入你喜愛的元素，盡顯個人風采。Qsire 於 2015/11 上線，獲得【 App Store 最佳新 App 】殊榮！你可以在這裡設計專屬於自己的 3D 列印手機殼！我們將持續導入新的客製化商品 ( 服飾 / 鞋帽 / 包包 ... )，發展全球視野的服務。---------------------► WishMall---------------------虛實整合已成為百貨與零售業的發展趨勢，威許移動為新光三越、遠東百貨、誠品書店、屈臣氏、潤泰 CityLink 創新商場、遠雄 U-TOWN 購物中心、北京金融街購物中心、重慶協信購物中心 ... 等，發展各式各樣的 O2O App 應用，透過行動化特性提供便捷服務 ( 虛擬會員卡、行動購物、電子優惠券、餐廳訂位 )，近期更應用 Beacon 技術，實現近端感知與行銷互動，並用於巡檢與查核作業。---------------------► WishView---------------------透過行動設備發展移動式管理策略，建構行動化的營運績效管理系統、事件回報通知系統、部門群組溝通系統；透過安全加密的權限控管機制，即時連入企業 ERP 網路查詢營運數據並取得視覺化分析圖表，結合通報系統接收突發訊息，並以內部溝通群組傳遞指示與應對策略。---------------------► WishOrder---------------------全臺第一個行動點餐服務 MOS Order ( 摩斯漢堡 )，自 2012 年推出以來，獲得使用者廣泛支持，已突破百萬次下載！每天都有成千上萬的用戶，透過這款服務訂購喜愛餐點。威許移動更在 2014 年與優質的飲料連鎖店「大苑子茶飲」合作，協助大苑子發展行動訂購飲料服務，並設計優惠券等行銷機制，掀起一波波秒殺與搶換風潮。2016 年度完成 McDonald's 麥當勞報報 APP，吸引不分年齡群每日集點、領取優惠劵，使用人數節節飆升，天氣鬧鈴一響，優惠就來！威許移動開發的 APP 都能獲得使用者四到五顆星的高度評價，過去三年間，我們開發的 APP 累計已突破 370 萬次下載，協助品牌企業客戶提供更好的行動化服務給終端消費者。威許移動不只是開發程式，更強調使用者體驗，我們重視流程設計、介面設計、視覺設計 ( Flow Design / UI Design / Visual Design )，為的是提供更好的使用體驗！威許移動持續提供穩定服務與高度品質，協助客戶發展長期的行動化策略！我們相信行動化既是趨勢，更能強化顧客關係、增加企業營收、降低企業營運成本、強化營運績效。誠摯邀請年輕的你，加入這個「‎新創」事業體，跳出「舊世代」的包袱，一起追求成長，一起創造價值！

job_lists.company: 香港商科銳投資控股有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
你想參與世界級的軟體開發嗎? 你希望你開發的軟體是銷售至全世界的市場嗎?  
CBX Software來台灣設立研發中心, 目前大力徵才中, 如果你是重視軟體開發且樂於分享知識的人,  這裡會很適合你, 我們重視軟體工程,  開發流程上會有design review 及 code review, 而內部利用JIRA confluence做知識分享.

【我們希望你】
• 重視軟體品質
• 對技術有熱忱
• 熱愛團隊合作
• 持續精進並改善產品的功能/效能

【職位責任】 
• 設計及開發全新的軟體功能、特點和程式庫 
• 優化及加強現有軟體的功能和性能表現 
• 編寫軟體設計的規範文檔 
• 程式編碼及全面的單元測試 
• 與管理團隊緊密合作，以確保軟體開發與需求相符

Find us on http://www.cbxsoftware.com
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/CBXsoftware/
Linkedin : https://www.linkedin.com/company/cbxsoftware
Twitter : https://twitter.com/cbxsoftware

job_lists.title: C++ Developer
job_lists.company: 泰錸科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
Timeline Technologies was founded in 2016 as an algorithmic research firm based in Taipei, Taiwan.  We are actively trading on several markets in Asia and looking for experienced C++ developers to join our development team.  At Timeline Technologies, our developers design, build, and improve our core trading system.  As a key member of the development team, you will collaborate closely with other developers, researchers, and traders.

Developers are focused on improving and expanding the capabilities of our trading system.  Technology include: 

• Trade Engine and Back-testing 
• Exchange Connectivity 
• Strategy Monitoring and Reporting Tools 
• Compliance and Risk Verification 

The work will be challenging, fast-paced, and competitive.  Timeline Technologies is a flat organization, there are no walls, and ideas flow freely throughout the company.  You will have the opportunity to work with smart people in a dynamic and creative environment.  A financial background is not necessary, rather we are looking for self-motivated developers that have applied new technologies or techniques to solve existing problems.  

What we're looking for 

• Strong C/C++ object oriented and low-level programming skill
• Experience in Linux 
• Familiarity with network programming

job_lists.title: Senior Data Engineer
job_lists.company: 狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Dcard 致力於打造一個讓每個人都可以放心分享自己故事的地方，提供一個讓平凡人分享不平凡故事的新世代社群服務。為了達成這個目標，我們的資料工程師利用統計與機器學習方法，分析使用者產生的內容與閱讀偏好、設計演算法、打造各種資料產品，讓每個人每次打開 Dcard 的時候都能立刻發現有趣的故事。

在 Dcard 你將有機會可以接觸到⼤量⽤戶產生的實際資料。我們每⽉有超過八百萬不重複訪客，每天有數以萬計想要分享與閱讀故事的人在 Dcard 上交流，你所製作的產品將能立刻接觸到龐大的使用者，成為改善使用者體驗的關鍵，在他們的生活中創造一個美好的驚喜。

我們正在尋找喜愛思考與分析使用者需求、動手打造產品的資料工程師，加入我們這個熱愛挑戰的團隊。

【你的責任包括】

* 管理資料工程師團隊，包含資料產品專案的管理、招募等事宜
* 參與各式資料產品的設計與開發，例如：文章推薦系統、資料倉儲系統
* 協助設計師、前端與後端⼯程師進行介⾯或使用流程的 A/B/n 測試
* 提供管理團隊資料導向的業務分析

【必要條件】

* 熱愛思考使⽤者的需求，將演算法動手打造成產品
* 有良好的溝通能力，能夠清楚的表達想法，並與設計師、⼯程師團隊合作
* 有三年以上的資料工程或資料分析工作經驗
* 熟悉各式資料分析演算法
* 熟悉資料 Pipeline 與 API 的設計與開發
* 熟悉使用 Python 開發

【加分條件】

* 有中⽂文字分析的經驗
* 有資料視覺化的經驗
* 有專案管理經驗
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

job_lists.title: Site Reliability Engineer (Operation Engineer)
job_lists.company: 香港商雅虎資訊股份有限公司(Yahoo!奇摩)
job_lists.content: A Little About Us Yahoo’s Senior Operations Engineering team is seeking a talented individual to play a vital role in a team that runs critical site up operations and systems engineering for Yahoo most popular internet sites including Search, Mail, Flickr, Sports, Finance, News, Video and many others. Tier 2’s mission is to increase the uptime of Yahoo’s properties by providing embedded subject matter experts to restore Yahoo services as soon as possible. The Tier 2's are fast paced and work together to solve complex problems before they impact the amazing experiences of our customers on a daily basis.A Lot About YouDo you have a passion for solving technical problem from the network layer to the application? Do you spend time trying to figure out how something works? Do you make real web applications and back-end systems faster, more reliable, more efficient? This position requires an aggressive troubleshooter who can multitask on problems of varying difficulty, priority, and time-sensitivity in order to maintain Yahoo’s site up. This versatile position requires familiarity with all the support concepts of business websites: systems administration, basic networking, and troubleshooting.Your Day● Identify the criticality of incoming issues, prioritize, and troubleshoot appropriately● Triaging and driving user and revenue impacting incidents to resolution, using critical knowledge of Apache, Unix processes, MySQL, and related technologies within the OSI stack● Track issues through the ticketing systems and follow through to resolution● Utilize monitoring tools to proactively identify issues and trends● Write clear and concise operational runbooks● Escalate significant issues to service, network or other operations engineers● Lead by example, deliver results and eliminate missed opportunities● Ideal candidate will possess a broad range of computer science skills. The candidate must be persistent results oriented, and a self-starter
job_lists.skills: 伺服器網站管理維護、作業系統基本操作、系統架構規劃與維護
job_lists.other_condition: You Must Have● BS in Information Systems, Computer Science, or equivalent industry experience (Troubleshooting experience in large scale distributed production environments (2 years))● Exposure to tool/product development is a plus, CI/CD concepts, Git or SVN● Knowledge of Unix/Linux, Apache, and Web applications● Strong written and oral communication skills are essential. Ability to document/report bugs, test cases, and problem reports● Ability to rapidly learn and assimilate knowledge of complex software and systems, and apply understanding of system architecture when planning operational tasks and strategy● Demonstrate knowledge in one or more of the following programming languages: Python, Ruby, or Perl● Experience with statistical analysis of defects and system performance a plus● Understanding of TCP/IP, SMTP, HTTP, load-balancers, and network server concepts

job_lists.title: 卓越計畫_Data Scientist (104人力銀行)
job_lists.company: 104職場卓越計畫 – 徵才專區（資訊類）
job_lists.content: 本職務為 104人力銀行加入104職場卓越計畫之職缺；欲應徵本職缺，必須符合計畫人才規範；詳情請見本計畫說明（請點擊本頁職務名稱下方的計劃名稱處）。【工作任務】 As a Data Scientist at 104, you will develop innovative new features and products that help user get a better job and help customer(company) find the best talent. Our team applies machine learning techniques on user behavior data to build products and features. We build systems to tackle hard problems in areas like job search and recommendation etc. You’ll work with product managers, designers, and engineers to build data driven features and products. If you enjoy working with data to build products and solve hard problems in creative ways, you will fit right in. Requirements: Critical thinking: ability to track down complex data and engineering issues, evaluate different algorithmic approaches, and analyze data to solve problems Creativity: you can conceive of new data driven products, features, and technologies. Planning: ability to set and meet your own project objectives & milestones Results: you prioritize, focusing on ideas and features that will have significant, measurable impact Strong background in Data Mining, Machine Learning, Information Retrieval, Natural Language Processing, or Statistics.. Experience in Recommendation System. Experience working with large datasets, using tools like Hadoop, Pig, Hive or Mahout. 2+ years experience developing high quality software in Java. Comfortable with data analysis & visualization using tools like R, Python or d3.js etc. Ability to coordinate effectively with team members in engineering, design, and product management Communicate results and progress internally and externally in meetings, presentations, and tech talks【公司福利】請見104公司網站>人力資源(http://corp.104.com.tw/index5c51.html?m=article&mid=93)
job_lists.other_condition: Masters, Phd in computer science, mathematics, statistics etc.

job_lists.title: 701: Solution Architect
job_lists.company: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: DCS (Data Center Service) team provides hybrid cloud solutions in data center to empower Trend Micro global services. We are looking for creative & self-motivate talent to join as to build up world class cloud service platform. The solution architect takes the responsibility to survey and study all potential modern technologies and plays the key role to select & design a qualified solution which fits the organization needs. The candidate should equip with solid technology background and rich experience. Hands-on experience for large scale hybrid cloud implementation is also the key criteria. Major duties & responsibilities:Communicate with internal stakeholders and propose creative solutions to improve user experience.Perform high level architectural review and design to ensure overall solutions fulfill user requirements.Mentoring and coaching technical leads in the project.Work closely with project and engagement managers to provide coherent direction.Provide consulting support services to resolve system application and integration issues.
job_lists.other_condition: Technical/ professional knowledge (items/depth):*Deep understanding VMware virtualization platform and vRealize Automation*Expertise in developing complex cloud-based product/services using Azure or AWS*Direct experience migrating applications from the enterprise to public cloud providers (Amazon, Microsoft)*Experience helping development teams build and deploy micro-services based applications in public cloud*Experience with Continuous Integration & Continuous Deployment tools and processes*Experience with container based development and deployment (Docker)*Experience with complex API integration between private and public cloud environments*Experience with multiple cloud automation/cloud management platforms*Technical thought leadership and innovation – brings thought leadership and strong point of view with a focus on continually improving service value (agility/cost/quality).  Looks for opportunities to enhance business value through IT innovation. *Remains unbiased toward any specific vendor or technology choice.*Business understanding - ability to assess current and future business requirements and leverage existing standards or develop new standards where appropriate*Python and Java development experiences

job_lists.title: HQA Engineer

job_lists.content: As part of Global Quality team in R&D organization, responsible for ensuring products design and developed for global market meet quality, performance and reliability specifications, developing hardware quality design validation test procedures Responsibilities:• Develop / establish design review and validation test requirement for new products and new features to ensure such are fully tested and assessed before design release.• Provide timely, precise and comprehensive executive summary report update on key issues and test progression & initiate mitigation plans to constantly meet test schedule.• Provide Quality management oversight to the local design organization in day to day operation.• Manage on-site quality team and optimize the use of test equipment and resource. • Conduct design review on key new features and resolutions to key customer complaint or field return to ensure similar problems do not re-occur.• Work closely with design team to interpret and understand product quality specifications and requirements and to devise methodology to validate them, including drawing up and proposing test plans.• Conduct and coordinate suite of product test and phase release review activities (environmental testing, reliability and accelerated life testing) per project plan and standard in accordance to requirement at various milestones in the product development cycle.• Conduct and coordinate product for the purpose of assessment and qualification of product enhancement, product customization due to design changes and/or component changes. • Prepare reports and makes recommendation to the team and management on product design quality related issues.• Develop, identify and set up test suites (including recommendation for equipment needed), procedures and checklists that effectively validate the product quality and reliability goals specified in product requirement document.• Perform reliability prediction and analysis including MTBF calculation.• Analyze test data to determine the existence of quality problems and work with design team to take appropriate corrective actions to improve/correct design.• Conduct design post mortem review and field design quality issues to drive for continuous improvement in design quality.•RF 2G/3G/GPS3GPP certification experience is plusRechargeable battery IEEE 1725/1625No matter notebook or mobile
